attributes.action: Ban the use of Glue Traps and make the sale of them illegal
attributes.additional_details: To ban the sale of Glue Traps and the non drying adhesive that is used to create them also make it illegal to use glue traps and glue boards
attributes.background:
Glue traps are used as a method of trapping animals this results in an agonising, slow and painful death for the creature who has been caught.
These traps are laid down to catch vermin however wildlife also get caught in these traps and die this agonising cruel death.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560288
